img_text: It's sad that a nigga can't even talk amongst his niggas without somebody recording it and reposting it or telling errbody I don' t agree with errbody goin at Kodak Black cause that convo should of stayed private It ain't 1ike he went at girl or went viral with his comments And most of these niggas would be tryna holla at girl a year from now if they could and they know it They need to shut down social media for bout a year so this clout chasin and dick ridin slow down
